name: Battle For Landriel
description: There were peace and serenity for thousands of years in the lands of Landriel, but it could not last forever. Soon, the Orcs had their eyes on these lands, and they could not be persuaded, and they would not go to negotiations. All they did want was the scorched earth.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
